title: Complete coding interview prep
description: Practice LeetCode-style DSA problems for technical interview readiness.

title: Study Japanese vocabulary
description: Learn JLPT N4 vocabulary from Minnano Nihongo textbook.

title: Research new 5G smartphones
description: Compare models with AMOLED display and at least 8GB RAM, 256GB storage under INR 16,000.

title: Revise English grammar
description: Practice English prepositions and review rules in grammar textbook.

title: Review automation testing tools
description: Study Selenium and IBM testing tools for software-testing interview preparation.

title: Build MERN stack sample app
description: Develop and deploy a basic CRUD web app using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.

title: Deep learning review
description: Study the concepts of CNNs, RNNs, Autoencoders, weights, and biases in neural networks.

title: Practice number theory problems
description: Solve problems related to primes, factorials, and even/odd checks.

title: Update coding portfolio
description: Add recent projects and optimize portfolio website for technical interviews.

title: Plan mock interview schedule
description: Organize upcoming sessions with friends or mentors to practice interview skills.
